content: Main Page HUMBOLDT-UNIVERSITÄT ZU BERLINCOMPUTER SCIENCE DEPARTMENTSystems Architecture GroupHead:Prof. Dr. Jens-Peter RedlichSecretary: Miriam LongPhone:+49(30)2093-41150 Head of Systems Architecture Group: Prof. Dr. Jens-Peter RedlichSecretary: Silvia Schoch (Phone: 030-2093 41150) Johann von Neumann HausLocation: Johann von Neumann Haus House III, 3rd Floor[postal address, contact][directions for visitors]Office hours (Sprechstunde für Studenten):Usually on Wednesdays, 09:00-11:00 AM, in Prof. Redlich's office (3.301).Please get an appointment by sending an email to schochsi@informatik.hu-berlin.de. Please include a brief description of what you would like to discuss.(Parts of) The Group as of July 2014[ photos from previous years ] ---"Do what you think is interesting, do something that you think is fun and worthwhile, because otherwise you won't do it well anyway."    Brian Kernighan Legal disclaimer. .  © 2025 Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin, Computer Science Department, Systems Architecture Group.Contact: sar@informatik.hu-berlin.de .
